column1: * 1919 - Dutch translator Willy Wielek-Berg is born.
* 1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien is composing Letter to W.R. Matthews.
* 1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Elena Jeronimides.
* 1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Bruce Charlton.
* 1981 - The fifteenth episode of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 2007 - The Lord of the Rings Online: The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar
** Elrohir and Elladan meet the escort and bring Arwen to Edoras.Category:Datesfi:14. kes√§kuuta
